name: Badge
description: Compact status indicator for counts, notifications, labels, or highlighting new content

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as a status element. Dot badges announce as 'Notification indicator'. Count badges announce the count with context (e.g., '5 notifications'). Max overflow is announced (e.g., '99+ notifications').

recommendedUsage: Use for notification counts, status indicators, or categorization labels. Use dot variant for presence indication without specific count. Set max prop to handle large numbers gracefully.
antiPatterns: Do not use for interactive elements - use Button or Tag instead. Avoid using too many badges in close proximity as it reduces their effectiveness.
